review: I had already bought the stick. Figured I would get the larger one too for $99.  it's basically the same. Thought if I bought the $99 one I would get newer movies for 99 cents like it said but it doesn't.
author: Racheal Stavroff

review: Everyone loves it. We have prime membership so what's included is alot. No delays, no issues so far.
author: R.S.

review: Works great!  Finally able to get my prime on TV and added Netflix.
author: Robbi

review: Fast and easy to use! Met my expectations 100%
author: Kaisha Gonzalez

review: I love this.. very easy to use!!!
author: Aracelis Quinones

review: This thing is awesome. I love that you can add apps for Netflix, HBOgo etc. and stream everything through the Fire TV.
author: NSween

review: Great product.  I like it a lot more than my apple TV because it has more content and has some fun games to play.  Wish it has more memory.
author: david

review: it is hard to get around on this device it didn't come with instructions so you just have to fish around on it . If I would of know the difficulities I would not have purchased it
author: Tami P

review: Need more TV selections included in Prime.
author: S. Gardner "SG"
